metadata.description: Complete development marketplace: 38+ agents, 32+ skills, MCP servers, browser automation, and professional tools

plugins.name: claude-dev-toolkit
plugins.description: Complete development toolkit: 38 specialized agents, 6 core skills, defensive programming patterns, Playwright optimization, and comprehensive automation scripts

plugins.name: superpowers
plugins.description: Core skills library: TDD, debugging, collaboration patterns, and proven techniques

plugins.name: superpowers-chrome
plugins.description: Direct Chrome DevTools Protocol access via 'browsing' skill. Zero dependencies, auto-starts Chrome.

plugins.name: elements-of-style
plugins.description: Writing guidance based on William Strunk Jr.'s The Elements of Style - clear, concise, grammatically correct writing

plugins.name: episodic-memory
plugins.description: Semantic search for Claude Code conversations. Remember past discussions, decisions, and patterns across sessions.

plugins.name: superpowers-lab
plugins.description: Experimental skills: Control interactive CLI tools (vim, menuconfig, REPLs, git rebase -i) through tmux automation

plugins.name: superpowers-developing-for-claude-code
plugins.description: Skills and resources for developing Claude Code plugins, skills, MCP servers, and extensions with official documentation.

plugins.name: primadata-enhanced-toolkit
plugins.description: All-in-one bundle: Memory bank, cost tracking, security tools, prompt engineering, doc automation, and specialized agents. Complete my-claude-code-setup features. Based on centminmod/my-claude-code-setup.

plugins.name: claude-mcp-cloudflare-docs
plugins.description: MCP server for Cloudflare documentation with vectorized search. Access Cloudflare docs directly from Claude Code.

plugins.name: claude-mcp-notion
plugins.description: MCP server for Notion integration. Access and update Notion databases, pages, and documents directly from Claude Code.

plugins.name: claude-mcp-gemini
plugins.description: MCP server for Gemini CLI integration. Access Google's Gemini models for alternative LLM capabilities.

plugins.name: claude-mcp-context7
plugins.description: MCP server for Context7 integration. Provides external semantic context and vector storage for enhanced memory.

plugins.name: claude-code-metrics
plugins.description: OpenTelemetry integration for Claude Code usage metrics. Track performance, errors, and usage patterns with observability.
